About

I’m an ex-banker turned software engineer. I graduated from Duke University in 2012 with a BS in Economics and worked for two years in Wells Fargo’s Commerical Operating Asset Finance division. At present, I am an instructor for incoming students at Dev Bootcamp.

"Perfection of character: to live your last day, every day, without frenzy, or sloth, or pretense."
Marcus Aurelius, Meditations
